name: Linear/Exponential
description: Converts between Volt/octave and Hz/Volt CV standards. Implements both linear-to-exponential and exponential-to-linear converters. The 0V point for V/octave signals is C3 (approximately 130.8Hz).

parameters.name: Hz/V
parameters.description: The Hz/Volt scaling for Linear/Expo converter.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: A voltage offset subtracted from the input.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Hz/V
parameters.description: The Hz/Volt scaling for Expo/Linear converter.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: A voltage offset added to the output.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

input_ports.name: Linear In
input_ports.description: Linear (Hz/V) input for conversion to V/octave.

input_ports.name: Exponential In
input_ports.description: Exponential (V/octave) input for conversion to Hz/V.
